items.title: We love Insta360’s Link 2 webcam with built-in gimbal and AI tracking, and it’s down to $143 all-time low for Cyber Monday
items.summary:
As part of the ongoing Cyber Monday sale event, Insta360’s official Amazon storefront is offering its Link 2 4K webcam for $142.99 shipped. Don’t forget to clip the on-page coupon to see the discounted price during checkout. That’s a straight-up $57 discount on its $200 usual going rate. This model saw its first big discount earlier this year in July when it dropped to the $150 mark, which it returned to several times since then, including during the recent Black Friday Week sale event. Today’s Cyber Monday deal, however, shaves an additional $7 off to mark a new best price to beat. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this webcam, and you can learn more about it below.

more…

items.title: PS5 consoles at $100 off are starting to sell out quick, get in there while you can
items.summary:
All things considered, it’s been a couple years since we have seen some really solid Black Friday and Cyber Monday console deals. There were, of course, some last year, but they were generally a bit underwhelming – this year we have the bundles. And with the official PlayStation Black Friday deals scheduled disappear by day’s end, and stock starting to sell out on select models, we wanted to touch down and make sure those interested had a chance to land one while the deals were still live. 

more…

items.title: Venezuelan parliament suspends session on US attacks investigation
items.summary: Dec 1 (Reuters) - Venezuela's National Assembly on Monday suspended an extraordinary session to debate forming a commission to investigate deadly attacks ordered by the U.S. administration against vessels suspected of drug trafficking off Venezuela's coast and in the eastern Pacific Ocean. Read full story

items.title: Michael Saylor's Strategy creates a $1.44B cash reserve funded by stock sales after cutting full-year profit and BTC yield targets due to bitcoin price drops (Stephen Alpher/CoinDesk)
items.summary:
Stephen Alpher / CoinDesk:
Michael Saylor's Strategy creates a $1.44B cash reserve funded by stock sales after cutting full-year profit and BTC yield targets due to bitcoin price drops  —  Led by Executive Chairman Michael Saylor, the company also added to its bitcoin holdings last week, bringing its total stack to 650,000 BTC.

Lamicall USB-C Rechargeable Handheld Fan

Buy for $4.50 (Reg. $13)

What we love

It may be cold right now for most of us, but warm weather will return and when it does, this handheld fan will certainly come in handy. I love that it’s able to charged via USB-C, making it a cinch to top off using power banks or a standard Type-C cable.

items.title: Amazon’s official Cyber Monday LEGO sale is live: Speed Champions, Star Wars, Technic, Icons, more at up to 41% off
items.summary:
As part of its Cyber Monday Sale event, Amazon is offering up to 41% off LEGO sets, with some new additions joining the massive lineup we saw from last week, like the Speed Champions Ultimate Formula 1 10-in-1 Collector’s Pack at $188.99 shipped, coming down from its $270 full price. This package set has only been seen going as low as $247 over the year, with this holiday deal giving you $81 off the going rate for the lowest new price we have tracked. With this package, you’re getting all 10 of LEGO’s Speed Champion F1 building sets, letting you build up and race them against each other in your own home-made series. It also includes an exclusive poster that features all 10 of these F1 racing teams to further show off your love of the sport. And don’t forget that it’s also the final day to jump on LEGO’s direct LEGO Black Friday/Cyber Monday promotions and select discounts.

more…

While the Amazon listings we had under the spotlight are sold out now, Best Buy has brought them back down to $399.99 shipped today as part of its 1-day Cyber Monday Apple Doorbuster event. It’s now live alongside a bunch of other solid deals on iPad mini, Apple Watch Series 11, and so on, and you can find more details waiting for you below.

items.title: Rare Cyber Monday deal knocks 25% off Nomad’s Grade 5 titanium Apple Watch bands
items.summary:
Nomad’s Black Friday sale has already proven to be one of the better chances to save on just about all of it sought-after gear in recent memory, not the least of which because of the regular slate of timed daily deals. Today, presumably for the final special sale of the event, it is offering a solid 25% off its premium titanium Apple Watch bands to elevate your Apple wearable to new heights – we rarely see these bands on sale, and almost never down this low.

items.title: Amazon undercuts Anker’s direct Cyber Monday pricing on SOLIX C1000 Gen 2 power station at new $349 low
items.summary:
As part of Amazon’s full momentum Cyber Monday Sale event, the official Anker storefront is offering the latest SOLIX C1000 Gen 2 Portable Power Station at $349 shipped, undercutting the direct sale’s pricing by $30. It’s been carrying around a $799 MSRP since its release back in September, with discounts before this holiday shopping event having kept the price regularly between $449 and going as low as $379. Now, you can get it at an even better rate, as this deal slashes a total $450 off the MSRP for the best new price we have tracked. Be sure to check out the other Anker SOLIX Black Friday/Cyber Monday deals here while they are still around. You can learn more about this particular station below, or get a more in-depth breakdown in our hands-on tested review here.

items.title: Originally $180 Logitech G PRO X 60 Lightspeed wireless gaming keyboard is 50% off for Cyber Monday
items.summary:
As part of the ongoing Cyber Monday sale event, Amazon is offering Logitech’s G PRO X 60 Lightspeed wireless gaming keyboard for $89.99 shipped. You can get this in both black and white colors, and they’re both down to the $90 low today. The variant in black with the brand’s GX Optical Tactile switches hit the scene carrying a $180 price tag, and it has lately been fetching $140 in recent months at Amazon. Today’s deal shaves $50 off its usual going rate, landing it $36 below its previous all-time low and matching the lowest price we first tracked for the white one around the same time last year. Head below for more details.

With Cyber Monday in full swing, over at Wellbots you can score the DELTA Pro Ultra Portable Whole-Home Backup Power Station with FREE 400W solar panel for $3,449.08 shipped, after using the code ECOBF8 at checkout, beating out the brand’s direct sale pricing that would cost you $4,178 with the event’s extra savings code. This monstrous bundle is dropping down from its $5,799 full price to $3,749, which already starts $50 under the previous low, but the deal gets all the sweeter thanks to the additional $300 that the extra savings code gets you. That’s $2,350 in total Cyber Monday savings, landing it at a new all-time low price. We also secured up to $13,289 in exclusive savings on 19 different offers revolving around EcoFlow’s latest DELTA Pro Ultra X power station that boasts greater expandability – all at new low prices starting from $174.

items.title: Lectric Cyber Monday Sale gives you up to $893 savings on e-bike bundles to upgrade commutes/joyrides starting from $799
items.summary:
As a continuation of its Black Friday deals, Lectric has switched over to its Cyber Monday Sale with up to $893 savings across its popular lineup of e-bike bundles – with some models already running out of stock. One option for those needing commuting power for urban living is the XP Lite2 Long-Range e-bikes that are getting $449 in FREE gear at $999 shipped, while the slightly more advanced XP Lite2 JW Black Long-Range e-bike is getting the same bundle at $1,099 shipped. You’d have to pay $1,448 or $1,548 for these packages without discounts, with the bundles here being among the biggest we have tracked all year. That FREE add-on gear consists of a rear cargo rack, a fender set, an Elite headlight upgrade, a suspension seat post upgrade, an accordion-style folding bike lock, and a pair of mirrors. Head below to check out the full lineup of deals while they last – stock could run out before the sale ends (with no way to tell how close either is).
